name: Super Banana Kart
description:
Super Banana Kart is a Love Letter to all things kart-racing.

In Super Banana Kart you play as the banana, and are put into the worst predicaments possible. New York, You must overcome this obstacle.

DISCLAIMER: THIS IS A PURE BANANA BASED ENTERTAINMENT PRODUCT AND NOT A VIDEO GAME.

Credits:
Banana: https://free3d.com/3d-model/banana-818653.html
New York City: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/urban/real-new-york-city-v...
Music: metarotta & edwakku
Programming: Big Banana Overlord
